posts.post_content:
Looking for a T213 type 1 coupon, in lower condition (PSA 1-3, SGC 10-40). 

HOFer preferred, but will also consider a common player. 

I need the back to have no paper loss.  I'm also looking for a presentable front.  Looking for a reasonably priced example.

Email me at: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url] with a scan and your asking price.

I can pay via Paypal or check.

Thank you in advance.
